name: Art Life
description:
The download version looks a lot better, so check that out if you're feeling up to it. Browser version added for folks just casually browsing.

Created for Global Game Jam 2022's Portland Indie Game Squad contingent!

Follow Val as they navigate the highs and lows of creation and life. You'll laugh (probably), you'll cry (possibly), and you'll definitely be like "Wow this is a game five people made in 10 days!"

Credits:

Ace Luke (they/them) (@AceLukeMusic)

Amanda Cotter (she/her) (@ac_pi)

Ruby Tucker (they/them) (@ikiruse)

Scott Anderson (he/him) (@sranderson)

Yori Kvitchko (he/him) (@YoriKv)
